body_html:
Sort of b) @F3PiX

I was thinking about adding link to something like application#show only showing it to users with a submitted draft and only from the end of the application phase to maybe the end of summer.
There, I can just take the application_draft from the application and render the disabled form again... What do you think?
body_text:
Sort of b) @F3PiX
I was thinking about adding link to something like application#show only showing it to users with a submitted draft and only from the end of the application phase to maybe the end of summer.
There, I can just take the application_draft from the application and render the disabled form again... What do you think?
body:
Sort of b) @F3PiX 

I was thinking about adding link to something like `application#show` only showing it to users with a submitted draft and only from the end of the application phase to maybe the end of summer.
There, I can just take the `application_draft` from the application and render the disabled form again... What do you think?
